project_descr: Tercera Comunicación Nacional y Primer Informe Bianual en cumplimiento del compromiso ante la Convención Marco de las Naciones Unidas frente al Cambio Climatico

outputs.output_descr: The project is part of the fulfillment of the commitments made by Ecuador to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC). It is also in line with the strategy defined for the Climate Change Focal Area proposed by the GEF 5.
